attributes.action: Order non-required electrical lighting be turned off in offices and businesses out of hours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cut down on lighting left on in businesses and offices out of hours.

Too much lighting is currently left on in offices and buildings out of working hours around the UK. People would not go to sleep with all there lighting left on in there homes why should businesses and offices be allowed to. This is having a harmful effect on our environment. These buildings all have alarms and nightvision cctv.

We are even lighting the outside of too many buildings which is wasteful and pointless causing light polution.

It should be compulsory for all non required lighting be swtiched off out of hours in businesses and offices. or for them to face a penalty.
